thread.title: EagleRider Provides All German-speaking Peoples An Easier Gateway to Dreams
thread.title_full: EagleRider Provides All German-speaking Peoples An Easier Gateway to Dreams - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: EagleRider Provides All German-speaking Peoples An Easier Gateway to Dreams
text:
EagleRider
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- As EagleRider becomes a household name across the world, all website versions are being reexamined for the highest standards of ease and convenience for citizens of all countries. The world's pioneer in motorcycle and travel experiences is proud to announce that the German website has been entirely revamped to maximize our support for the millions of enthusiastic Germans who make EagleRider their number one choice for a dream experience.
EagleRider's Chief Technology and Product Officer Hal Oreif remarks, "Since ancient times, the Germanic peoples have always held a reputation as fierce adventurers and the sheer amount of guests we accommodate today from Germany and the surrounding countries is testament that nothing has changed. We are honoured every time we are the ones chosen to fulfill their desire for excitement and passion."
Check out the German website and many of its hottest destinations below!
Main German Website
http://www.eaglerider.com/motorrad-mieten

ABOUT EAGLERIDER
Pioneering the motorcycle rental concept in 1992, EagleRider has since extended its branches to become a motorcycle experience industry giant offering services of all kinds to assist and empower motorcyclists and travelers worldwide. Whether you simply would like to try out the motorcycle of your dreams or go on a great adventure in the self-drive and guided tours offered from any one of our beautifully located 100+ locations across the globe, EagleRider offers the world's favorite brands including Harley-Davidson速, Indian速, Honda速 and BMW速 in motorcycles as well as Scooters, Dirt Bikes, and ATV's. We also provide motorcycle service, parts, and accessories in addition to a vast array of solutions for individuals as well as dealers that are looking to buy and/or sell their bikes.
For more information on rentals and tours, please visit www.EagleRider.com . If you are interested in buying and/or selling a bike, visit www.UsedMotorcycles.net . Our inventory of parts and accessories can be found at Store.EagleRider.com .
Contact: Press@EagleRider.com
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279385LOGO
